    void
    encrypt()
    Encrypts a message using Vigenere's encryption (p+1) % p.length() (shiftPass + 1) % pass.length() for (int index = 0; index invalid input: '<' msg.length(); index++) { if (Character.isLetter(msg.charAt(index))) { int shiftLet = msg.charAt(index) - 'A'; // index of msg char if (msg.length() > pass.length()) { pass += pass; } int shiftPass = pass.charAt(index) - 'A'; // index of pass char if (shiftLet + shiftPass > (alphabet.length() - 1)) { temp += Character.toUpperCase(alphabet.charAt(shiftLet + shiftPass - (alphabet.length() - 1))); } else { temp += Character.toUpperCase(alphabet.charAt(shiftLet + shiftPass)); } } }

    • encrypt

      public void encrypt()
      Encrypts a message using Vigenere's encryption (p+1) % p.length() (shiftPass + 1) % pass.length() for (int index = 0; index invalid input: '<' msg.length(); index++) { if (Character.isLetter(msg.charAt(index))) { int shiftLet = msg.charAt(index) - 'A'; // index of msg char if (msg.length() > pass.length()) { pass += pass; } int shiftPass = pass.charAt(index) - 'A'; // index of pass char if (shiftLet + shiftPass > (alphabet.length() - 1)) { temp += Character.toUpperCase(alphabet.charAt(shiftLet + shiftPass - (alphabet.length() - 1))); } else { temp += Character.toUpperCase(alphabet.charAt(shiftLet + shiftPass)); } } }

    • decrypt

      public String decrypt()
      Decrypts a message encrypted with Vigenere's encryption i: index in msg shiftLet: ascii code capital letters: 65-90
      Returns:
      a string containing the decrypted message
